channel.title: Rxswift on Abizer Nasir

item.title: The Road to Damascus or FRP and Me
item.description: Summary I tried to learn about Functional Reactive Programming to see whether I would adopt it in my own code. These are my thoughts about it. Slides Available on Speaker Deck Video Available on the NSSpain Vimeo Channel

item.title: Being Imperfect In A Perfect World
item.description: Summary Just some thoughts on the choices we make about the patterns we use in development. Slides Available on Speaker Deck
